headline: GTA Online
subtitle: On the Test Track
content:
Visit the Test Track to give the Übermacht Revolter, Enus Jubilee, and Vulcar Warrener HKR a cursory spin, test it out in Scrambles against your peers or race against the clock in a Time Trial, all for free — no need to worry about crashing and burning.

Players can spectate the Test Track inside the LS Car Meet by heading to an exit door of the Test Track and selecting Spectate.
